definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: Chapter III is the grammatical analysis of"Yizhoushu"Verbs.
sentences.chinese: 第三章是對《逸周書》動詞的語法分析。

sentences.english: A typical example would be colors used for syntax highlighting with an editor.
sentences.chinese: 一個典型示例是用顏色來突出顯示編輯器中的語法。

sentences.english: Otherwise, the syntax is not recognized.
sentences.chinese: 否則，語法就不能被識別。

sentences.english: The semantic representation of topic structure is mapped onto syntax by GFT interface.
sentences.chinese: 主題結構的語義通過語法功能層界面影射到句法。

sentences.english: In this case, the expression syntax is valid.
sentences.chinese: 在這種情況下，該表達式語法有效。

sentences.english: The setup here is very similar to the parsing of the main document.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的設置與主文檔的語法分析十分相似。

sentences.english: You must add actions and other supporting code to the defined grammar.
sentences.chinese: 您必須添加動作和其他支持所定義語法的代碼。

sentences.english: He is thoroughly drilled in English grammar.
sentences.chinese: 他的英語語法練得很熟。

sentences.english: From start to finish he’s learning vocabulary and fundamentals of grammar.
sentences.chinese: 他們從始至終都在背單詞和學語法基礎。

sentences.english: If you do send a thank-you note, always check for spelling and grammar!
sentences.chinese: 如果你發送了一封感謝信，要記得檢查拼寫和語法。

sentences.english: More than one grammarian have treated this subject.
sentences.chinese: 不只一位語法家討論過這個問題。

sentences.english: So I to lots of grammar in every class .
sentences.chinese: 於是我決定每堂課都記大量的語法筆記。

sentences.english: A: I think English grammar is the most difficult thing for me.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得英語語法對我來說太難了。

sentences.english: The word order of the attribute-head phrase is the biggest difference between the word order in Chinese and Vietnamese.
sentences.chinese: 定中短語是漢語和越語中最常見的語法結構之一。

sentences.english: They learn the language quite quickly and can use it well.
sentences.chinese: 一些學生使用這種語法規則學習法效果非常好。

sentences.english: Complicated as it seems, English grammar has its basic rules.
sentences.chinese: 英語語法看似繁複無比，其實萬變不離其宗。

definition: vocabulary/list of words (e.g. for language teaching purposes)/word
variant of 詞彙|词汇[ci2 hui4]
word (general term including monosyllables through to short phrases)/term (e.g. technical term)/expression
proposition (logic, math.)/to assign an essay topic
